interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels
Review Date: 2020/09/05
Store: Monikahair
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'UPC': '739515020639'}
Review Text: This does work but you gotta follow the instructions properly! It wont show any results immediately but over time I saw lots of dead skin shedding which was gross but also satisfying.
Review Title: It works!
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Beast Blue Beard Oil with Organic Argan & Jojoba Oils, 1 fl oz Tame the Beast {'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 FL OZ', 'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 3.54 x 1.54 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018546'} Out of all the beard oils the husband has used he says this one is the best. Its lightweight, moisturizing and the scent (which is excellent on its own) doesn't linger too long. I've tried other products from this line and they've all been great! 5/5 4 Pieces Glass Nail Shiner Crystal Nail Shine Buffer Polisher Crystal Glass Nano Nail File with Case for Natural Nails (Black Flat End) Mudder {'Material': 'Glass', 'Brand': 'Mudder', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} I don't understand the good reviews. This didn't work for me. It was uncomfortable to use and didn't do a good job. I feel like it did more damage than good. There's scratches on my nails, even if you use a lighter hand you don't see any results. Not for me. Winky Lux Double Matte Whip 24-Hour Waterproof Lipstick, Liquid Wet Lipstick for Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color, Hydrating Makeup with Vanilla and Avocado Oil to Lock in Moisture, 0.14 Oz, Cookie Winky Lux {'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Color': 'Cookie', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.65 x 0.65 x 4.28 inches; 0.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '859346006968'} If you have dry lips and you'd like still like to find a liquid lipstick that doesn't crack on your lips I'm afraid this isn't it. It dries out very quickly and it settles in my lines.
The shade of it is nice, I can imagine it looking beautiful on someone with deeper skin tone, I have brown skin but on me it looks unflattering. It does have a soft, non irritating scent which I like. Not for me unfortunately! Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels Monikahair {'UPC': '739515020639'} This does work but you gotta follow the instructions properly! It wont show any results immediately but over time I saw lots of dead skin shedding which was gross but also satisfying. It works!
profile:
**User Profile Summary (Updated):**

- **Grooming Products:** The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality grooming solutions, focusing on effective, lightweight, and moisturizing formulations with subtle fragrances. Their established trust in brands delivering consistent quality continues, yet there is evidence of broader scrutiny across their grooming routines.

- **Feedback and Ratings:** The user remains discerning in evaluations, providing high ratings for products that meet their expectations. Their recent experience with a foot care product demonstrates a balanced approach; while they found it effective with noticeable results over time, they also conveyed the importance of following instructions for optimal performance. This reflects their willingness to articulate both satisfaction and constructive feedback. Meanwhile, their previous purchase of a matte liquid lipstick indicated a critical approach, as they found it inadequate for dry lips despite appreciating its scent and color.

- **Purchase Intent:** The user is actively seeking products that offer a pleasant experience, are easy to use, and perform effectively, with a particular focus on non-overpowering scents. Their latest interactions reveal a commitment to premium quality but also a growing vigilance in assessing efficacy across various product categories, indicating an evolving perspective on product evaluation.

Overall, the user's profile reflects a discerning consumer who balances their preference for quality and an increasingly critical outlook on product efficacy.
